title: The Writer's Almanac for Thursday, May 19, 2022
description: Today is the birthday of the minister and activist Malcolm X, born in 1925, and also of playwright Lorraine Hansberry, born in 1930.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of the minister and activist Malcolm X, born in 1925, and also of playwright Lorraine Hansberry, born in 1930.
